content.rendered:
Earth Tones For Spring

Spring is just around the corner and what better way to celebrate sunshine than with a wardrobe color change. Think earth tones like sand and beige that look beautiful on loose fitted menswear inspired pants.

Don’t be afraid to wear beige from head to toe or mix with white tops, bottoms, or different tones of sand and beige.

I also love to add beautiful earth tones handbags to my look like the Jacquemus bag in sand that never goes out of style.

Both looks are from FWRD.COM. Top bag is from Jacquemus and bottom bag is Loewe. Earring are from Givenchy.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!
